description:
Everything you need to maintain knife and axe edges. 3 diamond mini-hone sharpeners with ergonomic handles provide comfortable sharpening, de-burring and honing.

  • Monocrystalline diamond surface sharpens knives faster than conventional stones
  • Includes coarse diamond (45 micron / 325 mesh) to quickly restore an edge, fine diamond (25 micron / 600 mesh) for a razor sharp edge, and extra-fine (9 micron / 1200 mesh) to polish and refine an edge
  • Comfortable to use in confined areas
  • No oil is needed, simply sharpen dry or with water
  • Easy access tip is .033in
  • Diamond surface are 4 x 2cm
name: DMT Dia-Sharp Diamond Mini-Hone Kit
